doc.title: 1000 Nights
doc.plot: The year is 814. The king of YEMEN, KURAIB is growing old and wants one of his three sons to take over his kingdom. On the stake is also the heart of the beautiful princess FULLA of DAMASKUS. But he doesn't know which one of his three sons are more suited to take over his kingdom.

The year is 814. The king of YEMEN, KURAIB is growing old and wants one of his three sons to take over his kingdom. On the stake is also the heart of the beautiful princess FULLA of DAMASKUS. But he doesn't know which one of his three sons are more suited to take over his kingdom.
